title: Urban Carefree Immortal Emperor - Novel Updates
tags: Carefree Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Shameless Protagonist   Special Abilities   Transmigration
author: Dragon Pen   龙笔
description: There was once an immortal cultivator fighting for the fate of human beings. Unfortunately, he failed that time; but fortunately got another chance as he was reborn once more as a human, on the earth of 5,000 years ago. With a second chance, he not only would embark on the road of saving all mankind, but also would retrieve his human nature on the new journey that would last for 5,000 years.>
